name: @rulesets/cli
description: CLI for Rulesets - AI rules compiler

scripts.build: rm -rf dist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && bunx tsc --project tsconfig.json
scripts.build:bundle: rm -rf dist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm --sourcemap --entry-naming index.js --external @rulesets/* --external chalk --external commander --external js-yaml --external picomatch --external ora && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --project tsconfig.json
scripts.build:binary: rm -rf dist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --target bun --outfile dist/rulesets --external @rulesets/* --external chalk --external commander --external js-yaml --external picomatch --external ora
